ack.title: ACKNOWLEDGMENTS
ack.p: Our work on distribution modeling has been supported by various CNPq grants and by BBVA Foundation to the Bioimpacto project. JCGO thanks the Brazilian Conselho Nacional de Desenvolvimento Científico e Tecnológico (CNPq) for a scholarship. RL and LMB research is funded by CNPq (grant 306694/2018‐2 and 304314/2014‐5), respectively. MBA acknowledges grant AAG‐MAA/3764/2014 by FCT. This paper was developed in the context of National Institutes for Science and Technology (INCT) in Ecology, Evolution, and Biodiversity Conservation supported by MCTIC/CNPq (proc. 465610/2014‐5) and FAPEG (proc. 201810267000023).
